domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text: Pence’s failure to wear a mask sets a horrible example and underlines a largely unspoken problem: the idea that REAL MEN DON’T WEAR FACEMASKS. Going barefaced isn’t macho; it’s stupid.
